name: muzi
description: A snappy, slick terminal client for MPD with vim-keybindings and fuzzy-finding written in Zig.
readme_summary: Muzi is a terminal-based music player daemon (MPD) client written in Zig. It offers a slick, Vim-like interface with fuzzy finding for efficient music library navigation and queue management.
key_features: Fuzzy find through entire song library
primary_use_case: Providing a fast, keyboard-driven interface for controlling an MPD server from the terminal.
cover_image_prompt: A conductor in a dimly lit, vintage concert hall, standing before a complex, glowing console. Instead of a baton, the conductor holds a stylized Zig symbol, directing streams of musical notes that flow from a vast, ethereal library (representing the song library) into a clear, organized queue on the console. Small, subtle UI elements resembling terminal windows with Vim keybindings are integrated into the console's surface. The overall mood is one of precise control and effortless music management, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a focus on clean lines and a sophisticated, dark color palette.

name: BrowserOS
description: üåê The open-source Agentic browser; privacy-first alternative to ChatGPT Atlas, Perplexity Comet, Dia.
readme_summary: BrowserOS is an open-source, privacy-focused browser built on a Chromium fork, designed to run AI agents natively within the browser. It offers a familiar Chrome-like interface and supports local AI models, making it a secure alternative to cloud-based AI browsing tools.
key_features: Support for local AI models (Ollama, LMStudio)
Familiar Chrome-like interface and extension compatibility
MCP server for integration with other tools
primary_use_case: To provide a privacy-conscious, locally-controlled browsing experience enhanced by AI agents that run directly within the browser, rather than relying on cloud services.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, open browser window acting as a central hub, with digital streams of information flowing into it. From the browser, intelligent, glowing tendrils of AI energy emerge, interacting with various web elements like a magnifying glass hovering over a document (representing data scraping) and a shield deflecting intrusive ads (representing ad blocking). Small, subtle UI elements within the browser window show AI prompts and responses. The overall scene should evoke a sense of seamless integration between browsing and AI assistance, with a clean, modern aesthetic and a color palette of blues, purples, and whites. The BrowserOS logo is subtly integrated into the browser's interface. Style: 3D isometric illustration with soft, glowing effects.

name: Converseen
description: Converseen is a batch image converter and resizer
readme_summary: Converseen is a free, cross-platform batch image processor that allows users to convert, resize, rotate, and flip an unlimited number of images with a single click. It leverages ImageMagick to support over 100 image formats and can also convert PDF documents into image sets.
primary_use_case: Batch processing of images for conversion, resizing, and manipulation across multiple platforms.
cover_image_prompt: A bustling digital workshop where a friendly robot arm is efficiently sorting and transforming piles of diverse image files (represented by distinct icons like JPG, PNG, GIF, PDF) into neatly organized, uniformly sized output images. The robot arm is connected to a large, glowing monitor displaying a simple, intuitive UI with options for 'Convert', 'Resize', 'Rotate'. Subtle digital particles flow from the input piles to the output stacks, symbolizing the batch processing. The background is a clean, modern workspace with subtle code snippets visible on a secondary screen. The overall mood is efficient and user-friendly. Style: 3D isometric illustration with a bright, clean color palette.

name: ostt
description: Open Speech-to-Text recording tool with real-time volume metering and transcription.
readme_summary: OSTT is an interactive, terminal-based tool for recording audio and transcribing it into text using various AI providers. It features real-time audio visualization, noise gating, and a browsable history of transcriptions, designed for performance and minimal dependencies on Linux and macOS.
key_features: Real-time audio visualization (frequency spectrum or waveform)
primary_use_case: Real-time audio recording and transcription within a terminal environment, with advanced audio metering and AI-powered text conversion.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, old owl wearing headphones, perched on a branch made of sound waves. The owl is looking intently at a glowing, digital scroll unfurling from its beak, which is filled with clear, readable text. Subtle sound visualizations emanate from the owl's head, showing a spectrum analyzer and waveform. In the background, a minimalist, futuristic terminal interface is visible, with the 'OSTT' logo subtly integrated into the design. The overall mood is one of intelligent processing and clarity. The art style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic and a cool color palette.

name: containerd
description: An open and reliable container runtime
readme_summary: containerd is an industry-standard, open, and reliable container runtime that manages the complete container lifecycle. It handles image transfer, storage, execution, and supervision, designed for embedding into larger systems.
key_features: Designed for embedding into larger systems
primary_use_case: To provide a robust and portable container runtime for managing container lifecycles, intended for integration into larger orchestration systems.
cover_image_prompt: A master craftsman meticulously assembling intricate clockwork mechanisms within a transparent, futuristic workshop. Each gear and spring represents a container, being precisely placed and connected by robotic arms. Input materials, raw code scrolls, are fed into one side, and perfectly functioning, glowing container units emerge from the other. Subtle UI elements displaying container status and logs are visible on floating screens. The overall mood is one of precision, reliability, and automated efficiency. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic and a cool, blue-toned color palette, emphasizing the 'container' aspect as a well-oiled machine.
